mapper.select: select b.* from pms_attr a inner join pms_sku_attr_value b on a.id = b.attr_id where a.search_type = 1 and b.sku_id = #{skuId}
select GROUP_CONCAT(a.attr_value) as attrValues, a.sku_id from pms_sku_attr_value a inner join pms_sku b on a.sku_id = b.id where b.spu_id = #{spuId} group by a.sku_id
